entries.title: Instagram's rollout of 'notes' feature sparks nostalgia for AIM
entries.description: Millennials rejoiced after discovering that Instagram had seemingly reinvented the away message — a staple of 2000s internet culture.

entries.title: U.S. sanctions Chinese firm selling video surveillance tech to Iran
entries.description: The U.S. has blacklisted Tiandy Technologies, saying the Chinese video surveillance firm is implicated in repressing Uyghurs and letting Iran access U.S. tech.

entries.title: FTX insider turned on Sam Bankman-Fried days before bankruptcy
entries.description: Days before FTX’s bankruptcy filing last month, co-CEO Ryan Salame told Bahamian authorities that founder Sam Bankman-Fried may have committed fraud by sending

entries.title: Elon Musk sells chunk of Tesla shares worth $3.6B
entries.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk sold about 22 million more shares in his electric vehicle business worth around $3.6 billion, according to a financial filing out Wednesday
